allow: Bash(if not exist publicimages mkdir publicimages)
Bash(if not exist storageappsettings mkdir storageappsettings)
Bash(if not exist resourcesviewsreports mkdir resourcesviewsreports)
Bash(if not exist publiccss mkdir publiccss)
Bash(if not exist publicjs mkdir publicjs)
Bash(if not exist resourcesviewscashiers mkdir resourcesviewscashiers)
Bash(for file in categories/create.blade.php categories/edit.blade.php Customers/edit.blade.php sales/create.blade.php sales/edit.blade.php)

Bash(then sed -i 's/class=""text-white /class=""bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 text-gray-900 dark:text-white /g; s/class=""bg-gray-800 /class=""bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 /g; s/class=""bg-gray-900 /class=""bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 /g; s/text-white""/text-gray-900 dark:text-white""/g; s/text-gray-300/text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300/g; s/ bg-gray-900 border border-gray-600/ bg-white dark:bg-gray-900 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600/g; s/placeholder-gray-500/placeholder-gray-400 dark:placeholder-gray-500/g; s/border-gray-700/border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i 's/text-white flex/text-gray-900 dark:text-white flex/g; s/text-white tracking/text-gray-900 dark:text-white tracking/g; s/rounded-lg text-white placeholder/rounded-lg text-gray-900 dark:text-white placeholder/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/text-white""/text-gray-900 dark:text-white""/g; s/rounded-lg text-white placeholder/rounded-lg text-gray-900 dark:text-white placeholder/g' "$file")
